Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2012 08:47AM marilynsav wrote: Hi mdg, thank you so much for answering .. I am very nervous and about to start chemotherpay.. trying to rally helpers for the caps.. I ordered them and spoke to Frank.. it just seems so good to be true and my onc discourages this.. I am however determined to try my best.. if it works it works.. it would take years to re-grow my hair and I wish to be as "normal" looking as possible for my kids who are quite young. You went through this all .. how does it feel on the other side ( that is what i'm calling post-treatment)?
Posts.Title: cold caps for chemotherapy hair loss prevention? any advice? marilynsav marilynsav
